message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper focuses on language modeling for image captioning, which involves both computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also mentions the use of convolutional neural networks (CNNs) for language modeling, which falls under the sub-category cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). Additionally, the paper discusses the performance of different models and their optimization, which relates to sub-categories cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper evaluates the effectiveness of the proposed method on two datasets, which falls under the sub-category cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
